mdfs.namenode.repositories
Class DataNodeInfoRepository

java.lang.Object
  mdfs.namenode.repositories.DataNodeInfoRepository

public class DataNodeInfoRepository
extends java.lang.Object

Stores Information about available DataNodes As this is a shared recorese it is a Singelton and synchronized by ReentrantLock The lock works in the manner that if the thread holing the lock would crach, the lock will still be released

Author:
Rasmus Holm

Method Summary
 DataNodeInfoRepositoryNode get(java.lang.String name)
          Returns the DataNodeInfo that relates to the name that is given.
 DataNodeInfoRepositoryNode get(java.lang.String address, java.lang.String port)
          Returns the DataNodeInfo that relates to the dns address that is given.
static DataNodeInfoRepository getInstance()
          Used to gain access to the shared repository
 JSONArray toJSONArray()
          Return all the DataNodeInfo stored in the repository represented by a JSONArray Each node will be one string element in the JSONArray in the form of "address:port"
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

getInstance

public static DataNodeInfoRepository getInstance()
Used to gain access to the shared repository

Returns:
the instance of the DataNodeInfoRepository

get

public DataNodeInfoRepositoryNode get(java.lang.String address,
                                      java.lang.String port)
Returns the DataNodeInfo that relates to the dns address that is given.

Parameters:
address - is the dns address that relates to the data node. ex. node.example.com
port - is the port that the data node is listening to
Returns:
the DataNode asked for, null if unavailable

get

public DataNodeInfoRepositoryNode get(java.lang.String name)
Returns the DataNodeInfo that relates to the name that is given.

Parameters:
name - of the data node
Returns:
the DataNode asked for, null if unavailable

toJSONArray

public JSONArray toJSONArray()
Return all the DataNodeInfo stored in the repository represented by a JSONArray Each node will be one string element in the JSONArray in the form of "address:port"

Returns:
all the DataNodeInfo stored in the repository represented by a JSONArray
